article.headline: UC Riverside 68, Long Beach State 65
article.story: RIVERSIDE, Calif. (AP) -- Klaus Schille had a career-high 17 points on 7-for-10 shooting as UC Riverside held off a late rally by Long Beach State to win 68-65 Saturday night. David Jobe scored with 30 seconds left to give UC Riverside (6-8, 2-3 Big West Conference) a 3-point lead, 68-65, with 14 seconds to play. Long Beach State's Jibril Hodges took a 3-point shot that rolled off the rim as time expired. Shawn Hawkins led Long Beach State (2-13, 0-6) with 15 points and 12 rebounds. Hodges had 12 points, all on 3-pointers. The 49ers overcame an 11-point halftime deficit, going on a 12-2 run to tie the game 49-49 with 8:37 left, but Schille made a layup on the next play and the Highlanders led the rest of the way. Brett Ost added 10 points for the Highlanders, who are now 2-0 without senior starter Vili Morton, whose season ended Monday when he tore ligaments in his knee.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
